item.title: Crocodile
item.description: SKILL LEVEL: ⭐ SIZE: 6.5” / 16 cm tall when made with the indicated yarn. crocodile pattern MATERIALS: Sport weight yarn in green (3 balls), dark green, light green, white (leftover) B-1 / 2.5 mm crochet hook Oval safety eyes (12 mm) Yarn needle Pins Fiberfill for stuffing head (in green yarn) Rnd 1: start 6 sc in a magic ring [6] Rnd 2: inc in all 6 st [12]
